A Complete Guide to BC PNP Skills Immigration

Immigrate to British Columbia, Canada as a skilled worker through BC PNP Skills Immigration Category. Check your eligibility today.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]British Columbia offers numerous immigration programs to attract skilled workers from across the globe. These programs generally fall under the BC PNP Skills Immigration Category. BC offers multiple provincial nominee programs targeting tech workers, foreign nationals, and entrepreneurs. This comprehensive guide will examine each of these BC Skills immigration programs and how they work.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” bottom_padding=”0″ left_padding_desktop=”0″ right_padding_desktop=”0″ top_padding_phone=”0″ bottom_padding_phone=”0″ left_padding_phone=”0″ right_padding_phone=”0″ text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-7-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”left-right” bottom_margin=”7%” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”What is the BC PNP Skills Immigration?” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1652255298564{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1652255502440{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

The BC PNP Skills Immigration category is one of the province’s Provincial Nominee Program (PNP) subcategories. It contains programs that offer a Canadian permanent residence pathway for qualified foreign workers in specific fields. These programs are:

[/vc_column_text]
  • BC PNP Tech
  • BC PNP Skilled Worker
  • BC PNP Health Authority
  • BC PNP Entry Level and Semi-Skilled (ELSS)
  • BC PNP International Graduate
  • BC PNP International Post-Graduate
[vc_column_text]Some of these programs are aligned with the Express Entry system, while others are not. Applicants should therefore understand the Skills Immigration and Express Entry BC requirements before applying to such programs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column Start Your BC PNP Skills Immigration Application

Apply for BC PNP Skills Immigration Stream with the assistance of our licensed experts.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1652256441558{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]A brief overview of each of the programs under the BC PNP Skills Immigration category is given below:[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-3-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”1. BC PNP Tech” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650976894604{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The British Columbia Tech PNP is for employers in British Columbia’s tech industry who wish to recruit foreign workers. Such employers can hire these workers and help them immigrate only if there are no Canadian residents or permanent residents available to fill the position.

The program offers a speedy pathway for workers in the tech industry who would experience longer processing times if they applied through other programs.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” el_class=”buttonlarger” text=”BC PNP Tech Requirements” margin_top=”20px” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/bc-pnp-programs/skills-immigration/bc-pnp-tech/”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”2. BC PNP Skills Immigration – Skilled Worker” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1665998184345{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The BC PNP Skilled Worker program is for skilled workers in professional, technical, management, trades, or other occupations who possess a valid Canadian job offer and wish to settle in British Columbia. The province created the BC Skilled worker program to attract foreign workers who can fill vital job positions in the country. Prospective Skilled Worker BC PNP applicants must ensure they are qualified for the position they have received their job offer in.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” el_class=”buttonlarger” text=”Skilled Worker Requirements” margin_top=”20px” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/bc-pnp-programs/skills-immigration/skilled-worker-category/”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-3-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”3. BC PNP Skills Immigration – Health Authority Category” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1665998198253{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The BC PNP Skills Immigration Health Authority caters to workers with a job offer who work for a health authority in British Columbia. This includes professionals such as physicians, nurses, and midwives. The province introduced this program to encourage more health professionals to settle in British Columbia and offers services for the province’s residents and citizens.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” el_class=”buttonlarger” text=”Health Authority Requirements” margin_top=”20px” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/bc-pnp-programs/skills-immigration/health-authority-category/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-3-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”4. BC PNP Skills Immigration – ELSS” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1665998222214{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The BC PNP Skills Immigration ELSS – Entry Level and Semi-Skilled program offer an immigration route for workers in specific occupations in the following industries: Long-haul trucking, Tourism, and hospitality, Healthcare, Food processing, etc. This program caters to workers with valid Canadian job offers that work in occupations considered less skilled than those in the Skilled Worker category.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” el_class=”buttonlarger” text=”BC PNP ELSS Requirements” margin_top=”20px” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/bc-pnp-programs/skills-immigration/elss-category/”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-3-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”5. BC PNP Skills Immigration – International Graduate” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1665998258279{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]BC PNP Skills Immigration International Graduate Program is for individuals that have graduated from a Canadian College or University and possess a job offer from a recognized Canadian employer. For this, an applicant must earn a degree, diploma, or certificate from an approved post-secondary school in Canada. Please see the Program Guide for more information on the degrees, diplomas, and certifications that are eligible.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” el_class=”buttonlarger” text=”International Graduate Requirements” margin_top=”20px” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/bc-pnp-programs/skills-immigration/international-graduate/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-3-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”6. BC PNP Skills Immigration – International Post-Graduate” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1665998278577{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]BC PNP SI International Post-Graduate program offers an immigration pathway for individuals that have graduated with a degree in engineering or science from a British Columbia College or University. The province has omitted any job offer requirement for this program to encourage educated science and engineering graduates to settle in British Columbia.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” el_class=”buttonlarger” text=”International Post-Graduate Requirements” margin_top=”20px” BC PNP Score Calculator 2023

BC PNP Skills Immigration Requirements

Each program under the BC PNP Skills Immigration category has distinct requirements. Some of these are shown in the table below.

ProgramJob OfferEligible TEER NOC CategoryWork ExperienceQualificationsWagesMinimum IncomeEEBC Option
BC PNP Skilled WorkerYesTEER 0, 1, 2 and 32 years (full-time)Qualified to perform duties for NOC TEER 0, 1, 2 or 3 occupation.Must match the average BC wage rate for the occupation$26,620 Inside Metro Vancouver
$22,186 Outside Metro Vancouver		Yes
BC PNP Health AuthorityYesAny TEER categoryRequirements set by the health authorityRequirements set by the health authorityMust match the average BC wage rate for the occupationRequirements set by the health authority.Yes
BC PNP International GraduateNoTEER 1, 2 and 3
NOC TEER 0		Not RequiredPossess a degree, certificate, or diploma from a BC College or University and the qualifications to work in the job offer’s occupationMust match the average BC wage rate for the occupationNAYes
BC PNP International Post-GraduateNoNot RequiredNot RequiredPossess a graduate degree in the engineering or science fields from a BC UniversityNot RequiredNAYes
BC PNP Entry Level and Semi-SkilledYesSelected occupations in NOC
TEER 4 and 5		9 months with the same employerMust meet the qualifications for the job they are currently working inMust match the average BC wage rate for the occupation.$26,620 Inside Metro Vancouver
$22,18NA6 Outside Metro Vancouver		No
BC PNP TechYesSame as Skilled Worker or International Graduate category applicant has chosen in selected occupationsSame as Skilled Worker or International Graduate category applicant has chosenSame as Skilled Worker or International Graduate category applicant has chosenSame as Skilled Worker or International Graduate category applicant has chosen$26,620 Inside Metro Vancouver
